item.title: Publications
item.description: This page describes some of the research publications I have been priviledged to coauthor. 1. GPUs for Physics Citation: Smith, Benjamin D., Logan W. Cooke, and Lindsay J. LeBlanc. “GPU-accelerated solutions of the nonlinear Schrödinger equation for simulating 2D spinor BECs.” Computer Physics Communications 275 (2022): 108314. 2. Faster and Colder Quantum Memory Citation: Smith, Benjamin D., Logan W. Cooke, and Lindsay J. LeBlanc. “GPU-accelerated solutions of the nonlinear Schrödinger equation for simulating 2D spinor BECs.
